keywords.value: International Committee of the Red Cross
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Many residents of Taiz, a city of 200,000 in the southwest of the country, say that the Houthi rebels have blocked aid from entering and have bombed civilian sites.

headline.print_headline: Medical Supplies Reach War-Torn City in Yemen
